name: Chicken Pants: Egg Fight
description:
The game is played with a controller and you need to be signed-in to Steam for it to work.

Chicken pants: Egg fight, is a 4 player online party-game where you control a chicken and  must fight to the death by firing eggs on the other players' chicken.

Got eggs flying your way?  
Use your headbutt to send them flying back and protect yourself!

Be careful,  as eggs explode, the ground becomes slippery, don't fall off the edge!

This game has been developped in 1 month during our free time. 

Want to know more? Check us out on Patreon https://www.patreon.com/sacrebleucollective.

Controls: 

  • Move - Left Joystick
  • Aim - Right Joystick
  • Poop an Egg - Right Trigger
  • Headbutt - Left Trigger

Credits: 

  • William Homs: Design / Code
  • Marc D'Amico: Art / VFX
  • Mathieu Martinet: Art
  • Walter Homs: Sound Design / Music
  • Garrick Handley: Animation
  • Sijia Mao: Netcode
  • Tom Morant: Music

Special Thanks:
